title: HipHorses â€“ Du und dein Pferd
overview: Horses facilitate and enrich our everyday life. Man and horse have a special relationship. Experience the first wobbly steps of a foal with or when nature strikes hard and cheer when show jumper Annika and her horse have to show their full commitment at the right moment in their most important competition. There is also exciting horse knowledge from horse expert Nina Eichinger.
